about_the_game:
Embark on a grand adventure as you take the reins of your own organization, nurturing it from humble beginnings to greatness. Assemble and oversee a dedicated group of members, each with their unique skills and talents. Explore the enchanting realm of waeth, brimming with both wonder and peril, as you venture into the unknown.

In your quest for glory and survival, you'll encounter a multitude of dangerous creatures that test your mettle and strategic prowess. Harness your crafting abilities to provide essential resources and gear for your members, ensuring their preparedness for the challenges ahead.

But your ultimate mission is to cleanse the realm of Waeth from the malevolent forces that threaten its very existence. Only through your leadership, valor, and determination can you hope to purge the land of these evils, leaving behind a legacy of triumph and restoration.



Key Features:

Complex Strategic Gameplay - Manage your members, enhance your base of operations, and make choices that have an impact.

Play at Your Own Pace - Determine your actions with each turn and make decisions with nimble planning.

Unique Enemies and Quests - Explore the realm of Waeth, unlock new areas, and uncover the secret to stopping monster invasions.

Be the Leader You Want - Face hundreds of encounters and tough decisions. Will you train your members further? , or send them on risky missions for greater rewards?

Randomized Events - Each play-through will feature different combinations of enemies, events, and outcomes based on your decisions. No two play-throughs will be the same.

No Second Chances! - Permadeath means there's no coming back when you fail to defend your base. The constant threat of defeat adds importance and tension to every action.
